name: Callable - Upsert NetSuite Payment
description: When there is a trigger event, do action

code.name: receive_request
code.description: New call for Upsert NetSuite Payment

input.request_schema_json: [{"control_type":"text","label":"Payment Internal ID","name":"payment_internal_id","type":"string","optional":true,"hint":"if this is an update and you know the internal id, specify it here"},{"control_type":"text","label":"Payment Extenal ID","name":"payment_external_id","type":"string","optional":true,"hint":"if specified, a matching payment with this external id will be updated.  If a match is not found, this external id will be used"},{"control_type":"integer","label":"AR Account Internal ID","parse_output":"integer_conversion","name":"ar_account_internal_id","type":"integer","optional":false},{"control_type":"integer","label":"Customer Internal ID","parse_output":"integer_conversion","name":"customer_internal_id","type":"integer","optional":false},{"control_type":"integer","label":"Currency Internal ID","parse_output":"integer_conversion","name":"currency_internal_id","type":"integer","optional":false},{"label":"Transaction Date","render_input":"date_conversion","parse_output":"date_conversion","name":"transaction_date","type":"date_time","optional":false},{"control_type":"integer","label":"Payment Method Internal ID","parse_output":"integer_conversion","name":"payment_method_internal_id","type":"integer","optional":false},{"control_type":"text","label":"Memo","name":"memo","type":"string","optional":true},{"control_type":"integer","label":"Account Internal ID","parse_output":"integer_conversion","name":"account_internal_id","type":"integer","optional":false},{"control_type":"integer","label":"Subsidiary Internal ID","parse_output":"integer_conversion","name":"subsidiary_internal_id","type":"integer","optional":false},{"control_type":"integer","label":"Department Internal ID","parse_output":"integer_conversion","name":"department_internal_id","type":"integer","optional":false},{"control_type":"integer","label":"Location Internal ID","parse_output":"integer_conversion","name":"location_internal_id","type":"integer","optional":false},{"name":"apply_list","type":"array","of":"object","label":"Apply list","optional":false,"properties":[{"control_type":"integer","label":"Doc Internal ID","parse_output":"integer_conversion","name":"doc_internal_id","type":"integer","optional":false},{"control_type":"number","label":"Amount","parse_output":"float_conversion","name":"amount","type":"number","optional":false}]}]
